answers.answer: My fingers and hands were numb my last 4 months of pregnancy... Its from swelling I think you'll be OK
Okay,thank you :) I just didn't know what to do
My hands have been going numb the past two weeks. I looked it up and it says it's normal due to swelling.

question: Okay, so we just had sex and in the middle of it my hands went really numb and felt weird so we switched positions so I wasn't leaning on them. Well, now two of my fingers are really hard and swollen and I have no feeling in the tips of them.Do you think this could be a sign of preeclampsia? And should I call my midwife?My baby is still acting like usual, I've felt kicks and I listened to her heartbeat on my Doppler just to make sure. I'm just a bit worried.33+5 and ftm if you can't tell lol.
title: Help :/
